段: 兩个老翁公婆合起來一百空歲囉，啊猶擱無半个子。啊這个老翁不時就定定吵這个某講：「你安呢我娶你這个查某亦生，啊干仔定定安呢、安呢……後擺仔後代卜那有人通攢？」安呢啦！啊暝合日定定安呢翁仔某定定都冤、都拍，拍講伊生安呢。

nng7 e5 lau7-ang kong-po5 hap8--khi2-lai5 chit8-pah khong3 hoe3 loh, a iau2 koh bo5 poann3 e5 kiann2. a in chit e5 lau7-ang put-si5 chiu7 tiann7-tiann7 chha2 in chit e5 bou2 kong2: “li2 an2-ni goa2 chhoa7 li2 chit e5 cha-bou2 ia7 be7 senn, a kan-a2 tiann7-tiann7 an2-ni, an2-ni……au7-pai2-a2 au7-tai7 beh na2 u7 lang5 thang chhoan5?” an2-ni lah! a me5 kap jit8 tiann7-tiann7 an2-ni ang-a2-bou2 tiann7-tiann7 to oan, to phah, phah kong2 i be7 senn an2-ni.

這个某安呢予翁安呢共、安呢共，企算安呢予伊共伊拍，到尾仔煞起懝心，煞想卜去投港自殺。抵抵仔去到港邊的時，抵仔抵著八仙佇彼佇得行棋啦。啊這个查某煞安呢失神、失神，煞直直行、直直行對港內入去安呢，對港口e5去。這个八仙行棋想講：「啊！這个查某那會煞直直行對彼港e5彼去，啊對彼去是危險neh！對彼去是會性命危險安呢！」啊才緊擱共伊叫倒轉來安呢。啊叫倒轉來伊是就共問講：「啊你是安怎你那行對遮來？」啊伊才得共伊講這經過予聽，講：「阮就兩个老翁公婆就安呢一百空歲囉啦！啊猶無生半个啦！啊阮老翁就安呢定定共我吵、吵講我生，不時定共我激講我著去死，啊好啦！我歸氣卜來死死e5啦！我是卜來自殺的安呢啦。」講：「啊！你做人赫戇！一隻蚼蟻就卜挃命囉，啊你安呢、安呢卜自殺？來、來、來，無問題、無問題！阮一人一粒這仙桃予你食，你一年食一粒，愛會記e5哦！一年食一粒，一年卜你生一个小寶寶，真可愛！啊你緊轉、緊轉！轉去就無代誌。」

in chit e5 bou2 an2-ni hou7 in ang an2-ni ka7, an2-ni ka7, khia7-sng3 an2-ni hou7 i ka7 i phah, kau3-boe2--a2 soah khi2 geng5-sim, soah siunn7 beh khi3 tau5 kang2 chu7-sat. tu2-tu2-a2 khi3 kau3 kang2-pinn e5 si5, tu2-a2 tu2 tioh8 pat-sian ti7 hia ti7 teh kiann5-ki5 lah. a chit e5 cha-bou2 soah an2-ni sit-sin5, sit-sin5, soah tit8-tit8 kiann5, tit8-tit8 kiann5 tui3 kang2-lai7 jip8--khi3 an2-ni, tui3 kang2-khau2--e5 khi3. chit e5 pat-sian kiann5-ki5 siunn7 kong2: “ah! chit e5 cha-bou2 na2 e7 soah tit8-tit8 kiann5 tui3 he kang2--e5 hia khi3, a tui3 hia khi3 si7 gui5-hiam2 neh! tui3 hia khi3 si7 e7 sinn3-mia7 gui5-hiam2 an2-ni!” a chiah kin2 koh ka7 i kio3 to3-tng2--lai5 an2-ni. a kio3 to3-tng2--lai5 i si7 chiu7 ka7 mng7 kong2: “a li2 si7 an2-choann2 li2 na2 kiann5 tui3 chia lai5?” a i chiah teh ka7 i kong2 che keng-ke3 hou7 thiann, kong2: “gun2 to7 nng7 e5 lau7-ang kong-po5 chiu7 an2-ni chit8-pah khong3 hoe3 loh lah! a iau2 bo5 senn poann3 e5 lah! a gun2 lau7-ang chiu7 an2-ni tiann7-tiann7 ka7 goa2 chha2, chha2 kong2 goa2 be7 senn, put-si5 tiann7 ka7 goa2 kek kong2 goa2 tioh8 khi3 si2, a ho2 lah! goa2 kui-khi3 beh lai5 si2-si2--e5 lah! goa2 si7 beh lai5 chu7-sat e5 an2-ni lah.” in kong2: “ah! li2 cho3 lang5 hiah gong7! chit8 chiah kau2-hia7 chiu7 beh tih8 mia7--loh, a li2 an2-ni, an2-ni beh chu7-sat? lai5, lai5, lai5, bo5 bun7-te5, bo5 bun7-te5! gun2 chit8 lang5 chit8 liap8 che sian-tho5 hou7 li2 chiah8, li2 chit8 ni5 chiah8 chit8 liap8, ai3 e7 ki3--e5 ouh! chit8 ni5 chiah8 chit8 liap8, chit8 ni5 beh li2 senn chit8 e5 sio2 po2-po2, chin kho2-ai3! a li2 kin2 tng2, kin2 tng2! tng2 khi3 chiu7 bo5 tai7-chi3.”
啊這个老阿婆仔成實安呢聽伊的話呼就安呢轉去。啊伊人原哪予翁吵了安呢心情有夠鬱卒，啊煞安呢戇神、戇神，共食一粒落去，想講：「哎喲！那、那、呰甜呰爾好食！」卜行倒到厝講八粒仙桃歸个攏安爾直直食、直直食，煞去予食了了去，安呢啦。八粒歸个攏食落去。

a chit e5 lau7 a-po5-a2 chiann5-sit8 an2-ni thiann i e5 oe7 honnh to7 an2-ni tng2--khi3. a i lang5 oan5-na7 hou7 in ang chha2 liau2 an2-ni sim-cheng5 u7-kau3 ut-chut, a soah an2-ni gong7-sin5, gong7-sin5, ka7 chiah8 chit8 liap8 loh8--khi3, siunn7 kong2: “ai3-ioh! na2, na2, chiah tinn chiah-nih ho2-chiah8!” beh kiann5 to3 kau3 chhu3 kong2 peh liap8 sian-tho5 kui e5 long2 an2-ni tit8-tit8 chiah8, tit8-tit8 chiah8, soah khi3 hou7 chiah8 liau2-liau2 khi3, an2-ni lah. peh liap8 kui e5 long2 chiah8--loh8-khi3.

哇！安爾，十個月到講煞安爾、煞若干若豬母咧啦！煞一箍腹肚成大箍，啊得卜生產這八个實在是真無簡單啦！哦！到尾仔安呢、安呢時候到，十月到安呢、安呢，囝仔卜出世囉毋，啊到尾仔，一胎一睏生八个啦！啊八个的中間，生出來了後，安呢煞八个ngi-ngi蟯蟯、ngi-ngi蟯蟯，到彼久仔佇得會爬會[走@百]來[走@百]去的時，煞安呢戶碇內亦子，啊戶碇外亦子。翁煞開始擱起煩囉啦！煞開始擱直直共罵囉啦：「使您娘！啊當毋生毋知影serh，一胎生落到底，共我生八个，啊安呢輸豬母得生豬仔子安呢！」啊又擱開始共罵，又擱開始煩囉啦。啊伊想想咧講：「啊安呢我做人、做人安呢麼是艱苦！會生你亦拍、生你亦拍、你亦罵，啊！不如擱來死死咧哦！」

oah! an2-ni, chap8 ko3 goeh8 kau3 kong2 soah an2-ni, soah na7 kan-na7 ti-bo2 leh lah! soah chit8 khou pak-tou2 chiann5 toa7 khou, a teh beh seng-san2 chit peh e5 sit8-chai7 si7 chin bo5 kan2-tan lah! ouh! kau3-boe2-a2 an2-ni, an2-ni si5-hau7 kau3, chap8-goeh8 kau3 an2-ni, an2-ni, gin2-a2 beh chhut-si3-loh-m, a kau3-boe2-a2, chit8 the chit8 khun3 senn peh e5 lah! a peh e5 e5 tiong-kan, senn--chhut-lai5 liau2-au7, an2-ni soah peh e5 ngi-ngi-ngiauh-ngiauh, ngi-ngi-ngiauh-ngiauh, kau3 hit-ku2-a2 ti7 teh e7 pe5 e7 peh lai5 peh khi3 e5 si5, soah an2-ni hou7-teng7-lai7 ia7 kiann2, a hou7-teng7-goa7 ia7 kiann2. in ang soah khai-si2 koh khi2 hoan5-lo2 lah! soah khai-si2 koh tit8-tit8 ka7 ma7--loh lah:  “sai2 lin2-nia5! a tann m7 senn m7 chai-iann2 serh, chit8 the senn loh8 kau3 te2, ka7 goa2 senn peh e5, a an2-ni be7-su ti-bo2 teh senn ti-a2-kiann2 an2-ni!” a iu7 koh khai-si2 ka7 ma7, iu7 koh khai-si2 hoan5-lo2 lah. a i siunn7-siunn7 leh kong2: “a an2-ni goa2 cho3 lang5, cho3 lang5 an2-ni ma7 si7 kan-khou2! e7 senn li2 ia7 phah, be7 senn li2 ia7 phah, li2 ia7 ma7, a! put-ju5 koh lai5 si2-si2 leh ouh!”

啊原哪是原在擱去彼位，啊彼八仙原哪擱佇彼得行棋，就問講：「嗯！當你今仔日那會擱對遮來？」啊伊才擱講原理予聽；「啊都您頂日好心提彼桃仔予我食，啊我就安爾那行那食，啊記e5，煞八粒歸个攏食食落，啊到今也來煞、煞生八个，煞歸巢ngi-ngi蟯蟯較輸豬仔子安呢啦！啊阮老翁看著安呢，伊麼是擱煩、麼是擱拍、麼是擱[手+勿]啦！我不如死死e5較直啦！我無愛住在這个世間啦！」哦，啊伊講：「啊！你那會赫無小心安呢！八粒攏食食落！彼是卜一年予你生一个、一年卜予你食一粒，你煞八粒攏食落，安呢無要緊啦、無要緊啦！當，食都食落去啊，阮[毛^火]你倒來啦！」

a oan5-na2 si7 goan5-chai7 koh khi3 hit ui7, a he pat-sian oan5-na7 koh ti7 hia teh kiann5-ki5, chiu7 mng7 kong2: “m3! tann li2 kin-a2-jit8 na2 e7 koh tui3 chia lai5?” a i chiah koh kong2 goan5-li2 hou7 thiann; “a to lin2 teng2-jit8 ho2-sim theh8 he tho5-a2 hou7 goa2 chiah8, a goa2 chiu7 an2-ni na2 kiann5 na2 chiah8, a be7 ki3--e5, soah peh liap8 kui e5 long2 chiah8-chiah8 loh8, a kau3 chit-ma2 lai5 soah, soah senn peh e5, soah kui siu7 ngi-ngi-ngiauh-ngiauh be7 khah su ti-a2-kiann2 an2-ni lah! a goan2 lau7-ang khoann3 tioh8 an2-ni, i ma7 si7 koh hoan5, ma7 si7 koh phah, ma7 si7 koh but8 lah! goa2 put-ju5 si2-si2--e5 khah tit8 lah! goa2 bo5 ai3 toa3 chai7 chit e5 se3-kan lah!” ouh, a i kong2: “ah! li2 na2 e7 hiah bo5 sio2-sim an2-ni! peh liap8 long2 chiah8-chiah8--loh8! he si7 beh chit8 ni5 hou7 li2 senn chit8 e5, chit8 ni5 beh hou7 li2 chiah8 chit8 liap8, li2 soah peh liap8 long2 chiah8--loh8, an2-ni bo5 iau3-kin2 lah, bo5 iau3-kin2 lah! tann, chiah8 to chiah8--loh8-khi3 ah, gun2 chhoa7 li2 to3--lai5 lah!”

啊八仙就安呢共伊[毛^火]倒來厝裡。啊[毛^火]伊倒來厝的中間才共老翁勸講：「啊當生著就生著啊啦，啊這囝仔攏呰爾水、呰爾可愛，安呢，啊您老某若、若成實擱投港自殺，你家己一个你卜育這八个囝仔你敢有法度通育？」啊共勸勸罵罵咧，講：「無啦！我是一時安呢氣起來共罵安呢爾爾，啊伊若正經成實去自殺，我麼是會擱問題成大。啊當好啦！好心，您做好心共[毛^火]轉來，好啦！多謝您啦！」啊原哪共這八仙說多謝。啊伊問講：「啊當是號名抑猶未？」伊講：「猶未啊！當八个是卜對佗號起？」伊講：「好！我共您號。大的號做有力一仔；第二的我共您號做、號做鐵骨二仔；第三的，我共您號做躼腳三仔；第四的，共您號做菜包四仔；第五的，共您號做大食五仔；第六的，共您號做粗皮六仔；第七的，共您號做[目+聶]目七仔；第八的，我共您號做雷公八仔。安呢後擺你這的子會真好育飼啦！您毋免驚啦！您戇戇仔飼，後擺這八个會予您真、真好老運啦！」

a pat-sian chiu7 an2-ni ka7 i chhoa7 to3 lai5 in chhu3--nih8. a chhoa7 i to3 lai5 in chhu3 e5 tiong-kan chiah ka7 in lau7-ang khng3 kong2:  “a tann senn tioh8 to7 senn tioh8 ah lah, a che gin2-a2 long2 chiah-nih sui2, chiah-nih kho2-ai3, an2-ni, a lin2 lau7-bou2 na7, na7 chiann5-sit8 koh tau5 kang2 chu7-sat, li2 ka-ki7 chit8 e5 li2 beh io chit poeh e5 gin2-a2 li2 kam2 u7 hoat-tou7 thang io?” a ka7 khng3-khng3 ma7-ma7 leh, kong2: “bo5 lah! goa2 si7 chit8-si5 an2-ni khi3--khi2-lai5 ka7 ma7 an2-ni nia7-nia7, a i na7 cheng3-keng chiann5-sit8 khi3 chu7-sat, goa2 ma7 si7 e7 koh bun7-te5 chiann5 toa7. a tann ho2 lah! ho2-sim, lin2 cho3 ho2-sim ka7 chhoa7--tng2-lai5, ho2 lah! to-sia7 lin2 lah!” a oan5-na7 ka7 che pat-sian soeh-to-sia7. a i mng7 kong2: “a tann si7 ho7 mia5 a2 iau2-boe7?” i kong2: “iau2-boe7 ah! tann peh e5 si7 beh tui3 to2 ho7 khi2?” i kong2:  “ho2! goa2 ka7 lin2 ho7. toa7 e5 ho7-cho3 U7 lat8 it-a2; te7-ji7 e5 goa2 ka7 lin2 ho7-cho3, ho7-cho3 Thih-kut ji7-a2; te7-sann--e5, goa2 ka7 lin2 ho7-cho3 Lo3-kha sann-a2; te7-si3--e5, ka7 lin2 ho7-cho3 Chhai3-pau si3-a2; te7-gou7--e5, ka7 lin2 ho7-cho3 Toa7-chiah8 gou7-a2; te7-lak8--e5, ka7 lin2 ho7-cho3 Chhou-phe5 lak8-a2; te7-chhit--e5, ka7 lin2 ho7-cho3 Nih-bok8 chhit-a2; te7-peh--e5, goa2 ka7 lin2 ho7-cho3 Lui5-kong peh-a2. an2-ni au7-pai2 li2 che e5 kiann2 e7 chin ho2-io-chhi7 lah! lin2 m7 bian2 kiann lah! lin2 gong7-gong7-a2 chhi7, au7-pai2 chit poeh e5 e7 hou7 lin2 chin, chin ho2 lau7-un7 lah!”
哦！成實有影。日子得經過成緊，到這囝仔十歲的時，成實有影啊安爾逐日會出去剉柴，一个安爾一擔柴安爾、安爾擔倒來，有通予你老歲仔賣，啊做所費，哦！彼久仔所費就成冗lou5囉，家庭的環境就加成轉好來囉。

ouh! chiann5-sit8 u7-iann2. jit8-chi2 teh keng-ke3 chiann5 kin2, kau3 che gin2-a2 chap8 he3 e5 si5, chiann5-sit8 u7-iann2 ah an2-ni tak8 jit8 e7 chhut khi3 chho3 chha5, chit8 e5 an2-ni chit8 tann3 chha5 an2-ni, an2-ni tann to3--lai5, u7 thang hou7 li2 lau7-hoe3-a2 be7, a cho3 sou2-hui3, ouh! he ku2-a2 sou2-hui3 chiu7 chiann5 leng7-lou5--loh, ka-teng5 e5 khoan5-keng2 chiu7 ke-chiann5 tng2 ho2 lai5--loh.
啊這八个仙家化身的，攏、攏真正可愛咧！啊攏安呢面形仔攏相仝、相仝安呢，予你認咧佗一个第幾的，佗一个第幾的就著啦！

a che poeh e5 sian-ka hoa3-sin-e5, long2, long2 chin-chiann3 kho2-ai3 leh! a long2 an2-ni bin7-heng5-a2 long2 sio-kang5, sio-kang5 an2-ni, hou7 li2 be7 jin7 leh to2 chit8 e5 te7-kui2--e5, to2 chit8 e5 te7-kui2--e5 chiu7 tioh8 lah!

有一日，安呢八个兄弟仔講去剉柴轉來，到彼一个、一个彼兵營的所在，講[立+店] leh彼樹仔腳，[立+店]彼得歇涼啦。啊彼兵營的牆圍仔，古早這兵營的牆圍仔講真懸啦，啊這的兄弟仔講：「啊當，老大的！老大的！共你號做有力一仔，啊當你的力量生做啥款？你麼安呢表演一下，予這的兄弟仔看覓咧！看一下眼界咧！」哦，啊伊成實講：「好！卜表演毋較快！無，來這座牆仔我來共捒看會倒安呢！」講安呢予伊行力落去捒一下，講彼牆仔倒倒落啦！哦！內面有一寡兵眾佇彼、佇彼、佇彼得歇睏、佇彼得坐，講壓死的壓死的、受傷的受傷的，講共安呢、安呢損失成濟就著啦！哦，啊彼衛兵就、就、就安呢共掠咧：「啊當你是安怎樣，你這囝仔子你有需要，當你那有彼个能力通來安呢捒、捒這个牆仔安呢、安呢倒落？安呢、安呢來去，來見阮的官長，哦！這、這無來共你處罰煞、煞會用e5?!」哦，共掠著卜見的官長啦，的官長講：「哦！你竟然、你安呢、安呢人就無偌大漢，安呢你成實有彼號氣力、安呢有彼號力量，你這个、你看毋是普通、普通人，這你無定妖怪變的。好！啊若安呢，無、無來共你斬頭e5！」啊成實叫彼、叫彼兵眾講、講、講：「共掠去對頭殼共刜起來，這著愛斬頭示眾。」啊伊講：「慢且時咧哦！你若卜共我斬頭示眾，你毋著愛予我厝裡轉來阮老母講一下，阮老母毋才會知影，通來遮共我收屍。」伊講：「好！你若赫爾有孝，好！一个[毛^火]伊倒，倒共伊老母講。」哦，啊伊就、就去叫老二的出來囉：「老二的、老二的較緊哦！較緊哦！外口的兵眾得等你囉！講卜斬頭哦！這、這著你鐵骨二仔去才有夠力哦！」哦，啊伊講：「好！我來去！我來去！」

u7 chit8 jit8, an2-ni peh e5 hiann-ti7-a2 kong2 khi3 chho3 chha5 tng2--lai5, kau3 hit chit8 e5, chit8 e5 he peng-iann5 e5 sou2-chai7, kong2 tiam3 leh he chhiu7-a2-kha, tiam3 hia teh hioh-liang5 lah. a he peng-iann5 e5 chhiunn5-ui5-a2, kou2-cha2 che peng-iann5 e5 chhiunn5-ui5-a2 kong2 chin koan5 lah, a in chit e5 hiann-ti7-a2 kong2: “a tann, lau7-toa7--e5! lau7-toa7--e5! ka7 li2 ho7-cho3 U7-lat8 it-a2, a tann li2 e5 lek8-liong7 senn-cho3 siann2 khoan2? che, che, che Nih-bak8 chhit-a2, bak8-chiu, bak8-chiu kong2 an2-ni nih chit8 e7, keng-chinn3 ka7 sia7--tioh8, bak8-chiu nih chit8 e7, keng-chinn3 kong2, kong2, kong2 he chinn3 chiu7 an2-ni thiau3 tui3 pinn-a2 khi3, ka7 sia7 khi3, i bak8-chiu nih chit8 e7, koh thiau3 tui3 pinn-a2 khi3, a koh keng-chinn3 ka7 sia7 ma7 si7 bo5 i hoat lah! che kah-si7 sian-ka e5 chu2-te7, li2 na2 u7 hoat-tou7 thang khi3 hai7-si2? a kau3-boe2--a2 kong2: “ho2! ho2! bo5 li2 to2! li2 to2! li2 to2! in, in toa3 ti7 to2 lin2 chai-iann2, goa2 lai5 chhiann2 gou7 lui5, che tioh8 chhiann2 gou7 lui5 lai5 ka7 ham2-si2 chiah u7 hoat-tou7!”

啊轉去，伊共雷公八仔講：「較緊哦！eng暗、eng暗講卜請五雷來共咱撼死囉！今也這个齣頭換到你囉！」啊雷公八仔講：「好！五雷若來我才來應付！」哦！五雷講公呢電公閃爁殛殛叫，講對、對這厝的厝頂安呢、安呢、閃爁就亟亟閃，雷公八仔講就出來共講：「兄弟！你是得[手+變]啥孔？」伊講：「嘿！啊你那會來佇遮？伊講，啊，講請五雷講卜來共你撼死，講做是您遮有妖怪。」「毋是妖怪啦！這是阮八个兄弟，那有啥物妖怪？毋免teh大驚小怪啦！您轉去啦！無代誌啦！有代誌算算帶我啦！」連這五雷來麼煞毋敢共撼，煞就安呢、自安呢，鼻仔摸咧，越咧擱轉去。

a tng2--khi3, i ka7 in Lui5-kong peh-a2 kong2:  “khah kin2--ouh! eng-am3, eng-am3 kong2 beh chhiann2 gou7 lui5 lai5 ka7 lan2 ham2-si2--loh! chit-ma2 chit e5 chhut-thau5 oann7 tioh8 li2-loh!” a in Lui5-kong peh-a2 kong2: “ho2! gou7 lui5 na7 lai5 goa2 chiah lai5 eng3-hu3!” ouh! gou7 lui5 kang2-kang--nih tian7-kong sih-na3 khenn-khenn kio3, kong2 tui3 in, tui3 in che chhu3 e5 chhu3-teng2 an2-ni, an2-ni, sih-na3 to7 khenn-khenn sih, in Lui5-kong peh-a2 kong2 to7 chhut lai5 ka7 kong2: “hiann-ti7! li2 si7 teh pinn3 siann2 khang?” i kong2:  “he! a li2 na2 e7 lai5 ti7 chia? i kong2, a, kong2 chhiann2 gou7 lui5 kong2 beh lai5 ka7 li2 ham2-si2, kong2-choe3 si7 lin2 chia u7 iau-koai3.” “m7 si7 iau-koai3 lah! che si7 gun2 peh e5 hiann-ti7, na2 u7 siann2-mih8 iau-koai3? m7 bian2 teh toa7 kiann sio2 koai3 lah! lin2 tng2--khi3 lah! bo5 tai7-chi3 lah! u7 tai7-chi3 sng3-sng3 tai3 goa2 lah!” lian5 che gou7 lui5 lai5 ma7 soah m7 kann2 ka7 ham2, soah chiu7 an2-ni, chu7 an2-ni, phinn7-a2 bong leh, oat8--leh koh tng2--khi3.
以上這是一个阮做囝仔若會使講：「譀譀古、譀古啦！」講予逐个做參考啦！以上完了。
i2-siong7 che si7 chit8 e5 gun2 cho3 gin2-a2 na7 e7 sai2 kong2: “ham3-ham3 kou2, ham3-kou2 lah!” kong2 hou7 tak8 e5 choe3 chham-kho2 lah! i2-siong7 oan5-liau2.
